text: It might be possible by storing the pieces of information required for the invite as properties, and then using said properties to build the URL string. However I haven't done this before so not 100% sure. Or maybe there's an app in the marketplace?

Hi <@U2H3TT8F2>, came across this thread and wanted to ask if anything has changed for this - is it possible to display featured images from an external RSS feed (podcast rss?) or is this a known limitation of the rss_listing tag?
